data.enText: a pot or other object made of clay that has been made permanently hard by heat
an exhibition of ceramics by Picasso

data.chText: 制陶艺术；陶瓷装潢艺术
data.enText: the art of making and decorating ceramics

simple_means.memory_skill: ceram 陶土 + ic 某种药 → 陶瓷

tr: an artifact made of hard brittle material produced from nonmetallic minerals by firing at high temperatures
of or relating to or made from a ceramic

value.def: Ceramic is clay that has been heated to a very high temperature so that it becomes hard.
Ceramics is the art of making artistic objects out of clay.

partsOfSpeech.dec: ceram 陶土 + ic 某种药 → 陶瓷
ceram 陶土 + ics …术 → 制陶术，制陶业
ceram 陶土 + ist 人 → 陶艺家
